entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
